Class RealEstate

java.lang.Object
org.example.RealEstate
All Implemented Interfaces:
PropertyInterface
Direct Known Subclasses:
Panel
public class RealEstate extends Object implements PropertyInterface
Represents a general real estate property with attributes such as city, price, area, number of rooms, and genre.

This class implements the PropertyInterface and provides logic for calculating total price, applying discounts, and evaluating space efficiency.

    • RealEstate

      public RealEstate(String city, double price, double sqm, int numberOfRooms, RealEstate.Genre genre)
      Constructs a RealEstate instance with specified details.
      Parameters:
      city - the city where the property is located
      price - the base price of the property
      sqm - the area of the property in square meters
      numberOfRooms - the number of rooms in the property
      genre - the genre or type of the property

    • getTotalPrice

      public int getTotalPrice()
      Calculates the total price of the property based on its city.

      City-based multipliers:

      • Budapest: +30%
      • Debrecen: +20%
      • Nyiregyhaza: +15%
      Specified by:
      getTotalPrice in interface PropertyInterface
      Returns:
      the final total price

    • averageSqmPerRoom

      public double averageSqmPerRoom()

      Specified by:
      averageSqmPerRoom in interface PropertyInterface
      Returns:
      the average space per room, or 0 if there are no rooms
